```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

#Import data
LST_2015_16_WMA <- read_csv("LST_2015_16_WMA.csv")
LST<-LST_2015_16_WMA %>% 
  select(NAME, LST_MIN, LST_MAX, LST_RANGE, LST_MEAN,LST_STD, LST_MEDIAN, LST_PCT90, LST_Month, LST_Year)
as.factor(LST$LST_Year)
as.factor(LST$LST_Month)
AvgNDVI_2015_16_WMA <- read_csv("AvgNDVI_2015_16_WMA.csv")
AvgNDVI<-AvgNDVI_2015_16_WMA 
as.factor(AvgNDVI$AvgNDVI_Year)
as.factor(AvgNDVI$AvgNDVI_Month)
Precip_2015_16_WMA <- read_csv("Precip_2015_16_WMA.csv",show_col_types = FALSE)
Precip<-Precip_2015_16_WMA 
as.factor(Precip$PRECIP_Month) 
as.factor(Precip$PRECIP_Year)
Soil_10_to_40_tavg_WMA <- read_csv("Soil_10_to_40_tavg_WMA.csv",show_col_types = FALSE)
Soil1040<-Soil_10_to_40_tavg_WMA 
as.factor(Soil1040$Soil_10_40_Year) 
as.factor(Soil1040$Soil_10_40_Month)
```

```{r}

p1<-ggplot(AvgNDVI,aes(x=AvgNDVI$AvgNDVI_Month,y=AvgNDVI$AvgNDVI_RANGE,color=AvgNDVI$NAME))+
  geom_line()+
  xlab("Month") + ylab("Range Average NDVI") 
p1 + scale_color_discrete(name="Communal land")
```
